channel.title: Server bot
channel.description: Well i have manage to make the basics of a server bot and desperatly need ideas of what it should/can do. At the moment, say if you pm the bot @Time it will pm you back the time and @players it will pm you back the amount of players online i need other ideas of what it can/should do.

item.title: Server bot
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well i have manage to make the basics of a server bot and desperatly need ideas of what it should/can do.
At the moment, say if you pm the bot @Time it will pm you back the time and @players it will pm you back the amount of players online i need other ideas of what it can/should do.

Read full topic
